editorialDecl.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text divison is as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".)

div.head: prathamopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: sthiramapi kurute yaḥ kāmi nīnāṃ prasaṅgam || 1 ||
abhyaṅgaṃ mastunā kuryāt snānaṃ caiva sukhāmbunā || 11 ||
rasendre bhakṣyamāṇe tu kāmāndho jāyate naraḥ || 12 ||
maithunena vinā tasya hyajīrṇo jāyate rasaḥ |

note.p: yasyāstu kuñcitāḥ keśāḥ śyāmā yā padmalocanā | surūpā taruṇaṃ bhinnavistīrṇajaghanasthalā || saṅkīrṇahṛdayā pīnastanabhāreṇa nāmitā | cumba nāliṅganasparśakomalā mṛdubhāṣiṇī || aśvatthapatrasadṛśayonideśasuśobhi tā | kṛṣṇapakṣe puṣpavatī sā nārī kākinī smṛtā || rasabandhe prayoge ca utta mā sā rasāyane ra. ra. sa. a. 6 ||

lg.l: mūlakaṃ laśunaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ ca varjayet || 16 ||
rātrau jāgaraṇaṃ tyājyaṃ divāsvāpaṃ ca maithunam |
mūlaṃ vā kāravallyutthaṃ saindhavaṃ vā gavāṃ jalaiḥ || 21 ||
dinaṃ mandāgninā taṃ vai samuddhṛtya vicūrṇayet |
cūrṇāṃśaṃ gandhakaṃ dattvā garbhayantre tryahaṃ pacet || 32 ||
śuddhasūtaṃ vyomasattvaṃ suvarṇaṃ ca samaṃ samam || 36 ||
mṛṇmayaṃ sampuṭaṃ kṛtvā chāyāśuṣkaṃ ca kārayet |
snuhyā vā hemavallyā vā kṣīraiḥ śuddharasaṃ dinam |
māraṇaṃ vādikhaṇḍe vā tathā jñeyaṃ rasāyane || 56 ||

div.trailer: iti śrīpārvatīputranityanāthasiddhaviracite rasaratnākare rasāyanakhaṇḍe rasa- māraṇaṃ nāma prathamopadeśaḥ ||

div.head: dvitīyopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: sūtapādaṃ mṛtaṃ svarṇaṃ sarvaṃ mardyaṃ dināvadhi |
samaṃ sarvaṃ sadā cānu bhakṣyaṃ syātkrāmaṇe hitam |
dvābhyāṃ tulyaṃ mṛtaṃ kāntaṃ kāntatulyaṃ mṛtābhrakam |
palaikaṃ madhunā lehyaṃ krāmakaṃ paramaṃ rase |
vajrasūtābhrahemnāṃ tu bhasma śuddhaṃ tu mākṣikam || 13 ||
suvarṇaṃ pāradaṃ kāntaṃ mṛtaṃ sarvaṃ samaṃ bhavet |
viḍaṅgaṃ dviniśaṃ vyoṣaṃ samaṃ cūrṇaṃ prakalpayet |
āragvadhasya mūlaṃ tu cūrṇasya dviguṇaṃ bhavet || 25 ||
cūrṇasya dviguṇaṃ cājyaṃ kṣaudraṃ caiva caturguṇam |
sarvaṃ pūrvarase kṣiptvā mṛdvagnau cālayan pacet || 26 ||
pārado gaganaṃ kāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca māritaṃ samam || 34 ||
dhānyarāśau sthitaṃ māsaṃ tato niṣkatrayaṃ samam |
mṛtaṃ sūtaṃ śuddhagandhaṃ triphalāṃ gugugluṃ samam |
ajasya vṛṣaṇaṃ pācyaṃ gavāṃ kṣīreṇa taṃ niśi |
rasaṃ vajraṃ svarṇakānte muṇḍaṃ ca māritaṃ samam |
bhūdhare dinamekaṃ tu khyātaḥ siddharasaḥ paraḥ || 47 ||
bhakṣayedvā sitā sārdhaṃ krāmakaṃ parame rase || 49 ||
pāradābhraṃ mṛtaṃ tulyaṃ dvābhyāṃ tulyaṃ tu gandhakam || 53 ||
bhāgāṣṭakaṃ guḍaṃ tasmin kṣipedbhāgaṃ ca pippalīm || 58 ||
mṛdvagninā ca tatsarvaṃ piṇḍitaṃ bhakṣayet palam |
tataśca ṭaṅkaṇaṃ kācaṃ dattvā ruddhvā dhameddṛḍham |
chāgīmūtreṇa vā taṃ vai karṣaikaṃ krāmakaṃ param |
jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ nihantyāśu satyaṃ kāñcāyano rasaḥ |
parānando raso nāma ghṛtairniṣkaṃ sadā lihet |
marditaṃ taddinaṃ ruddhvā dhmāto baddho bhavedrasaḥ || 77 ||
tasmin pādaṃ mṛtaṃ svarṇaṃ kṣiptvā vahnyārdrakadravaiḥ |
tulyaṃ pūrvarasaṃ tulyaṃ niṣkaikaikaṃ ca bhakṣayet |
svarṇatārārkakāntaṃ ca tīkṣṇaṃ vā māritaṃ samam |
samaṃ sūnānmṛtaṃ vajraṃ pādāṃśaṃ tatra yojayet || 82 ||
uddhṛtya gandhakaṃ tulyaṃ dattvā ruddhvā dhameddrutam |
palaikaṃ gandhakaṃ kṣīraiḥ krāmakaṃ cānu pāyayet || 86 ||
tatsarvaṃ kacchape yantre kṣiptvā tatraiva gandhakam || 88 ||
kāsamardarasaiḥ piṣṭaṃ tulyaṃ dattvā nirudhya ca |
kāsīsaṃ ca daśāṃśena dattvā mardyaṃ dināvadhi |
ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ tu svarṇaṃ jāryaṃ rasasya vai || 96 ||
tato jāryaṃ mṛtaṃ vajraṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśaṃ ca hemavat |
tayostulyaṃ kāntacūrṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vā muṇḍameva vā |
taccūrṇaṃ pūrvacūrṇaṃ ca samaṃ kṣaudreṇa karṣakam || 107 ||
taṃ kandaṃ vajramūṣāyāṃ ruddhvā laghupuṭe pacet || 112 ||
rasaḥ kakṣapuṭo nāma guñjaikaṃ madhunā lihet || 113 ||
tīkṣṇaṃ ca tulyatulyāṃśaṃ sarveṣāṃ gandhakaṃ samam || 116 ||
lohitaṃ vā'tha vā kṛṣṇaṃ vaikrāntaṃ māritaṃ palam |
tānārādhya ca teṣu sāramakhilaṃ saṅgṛhya śāstrādapi
bhūpānāṃ viduṣāṃ mahāmatimatāṃ proktaṃ hitārthāya vai || 140 ||

div.trailer: iti śrīpārvatīputranityanāthasiddhaviracite rasaratnākare caturthe rasāyanakhaṇḍe divyarasairdehasādhanaṃ nāma dvitīya upadeśaḥ || 2 ||

div.head: atha tṛtīyopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: gojihvā saindhavaṃ guñjā hyārdrakaṃ ca samaṃ samam || 2 ||
pāradaṃ vyomasattvaṃ ca kāntaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca muṇḍakam || 3 ||
tāpyasattvaṃ ca tulyāṃśaṃ sarvaṃ sañcūrṇya mardayet |
vaktre śirasi kaṇṭhe vā karṇe vā dhāritā kare || 7 ||
taṃ ruddhvā vajramūṣāyāṃ pacedyāmaṃ tu bhūdhare |
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ śvetakācaṃ ca dattvā pṛṣṭhe nirudhya ca |
jāyate guṭikā divyā nāmnā vajreśvarī parā |
vaktrasthā sā jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ hanti saṃvatsarātkila || 18 ||
kṣiptvā tasyāṃ nirundhyātha yāmamātraṃ dṛḍhaṃ dhamet |
vandhyā sarvaṃ samaṃ piṣṭvā pūrvagolaṃ pralepayet || 32 ||

note.p: kṣiptvā tu mardayeccānu ārdrakasya dravaiḥ punaḥ kha. |

lg.l: kumāryāḥ svarasaṃ grāhyaṃ guḍena saha loḍayet || 55 ||
lohapātre drute gandhe pādāṃśaṃ pāradaṃ kṣipet || 60 ||
gāndhārīguṭikā siddhā varṣaṃ vaktre sthitā sadā || 65 ||
tulyaṃ tulyaṃ kṣipettasmin dinaṃ sarvaṃ vimardayet |
mārtaṇḍī guṭikā hyeṣā varṣaikaṃ yasya vaktragā |
tasya vaktre gavāṃ kṣīraṃ stokaṃ stokaṃ niṣecayet |
tīkṣṇaṃ kāntaṃ tālakaṃ ca śuddhaṃ kṛtvā vimiśrayet |
yasya vaktre sthitā tasya jarā mṛtyurna vidyate |
strīstanyena dinaṃ mardyaṃ tena mūṣāṃ pralepayet || 84 ||
tanmadhye drutasūtaṃ tu vajrabhasma samaṃ samam |
evaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kāryaṃ vajrasūtaṃ milatyalam || 86 ||
evaṃ mūṣāśate deyaṃ tulyaṃ tulyaṃ dhaman dhaman || 87 ||
ṭaṅkaṇaṃ karkaṭāsthīni ūrṇā caiva śilā jatu || 90 ||
dravaṃ divyauṣadhīnāṃ ca dattvā tatraiva taddhamet || 92 ||
udare jāyate vahniḥ pibetkṣīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ || 95 ||
mardayeddinamekaṃ tu kṛtvā taṃ golakaṃ punaḥ |
catuḥpalāṃ nāgamūṣāṃ kṛtvā tasyāṃ tu tatkṣipet || 99 ||
mṛṇmūṣāyāṃ tu tāṃ ruddhvā āraṇyotpalakaiḥ puṭet || 100 ||
marditaṃ dvandva liptāyāṃ mūṣāyāṃ cāndhitaṃ puṭet || 105 ||
tadrasaṃ vyomasattvaṃ ca kāñcanaṃ ca samaṃ samam || 108 ||
kāntaṃ śulbaṃ samaṃ cūrṇyaṃ vajramūṣāndhitaṃ dhamet |
tattulyaṃ drutasūtaṃ tu sarvaṃ yāmaṃ vimardayet || 114 ||
guṭikā jāyate divyā nāmnā ratneśvarī tathā |
varṣadvādaśaparyantaṃ yasya vaktre sthitā tu sā || 119 ||
svarṇaṃ kṛṣṇābhrasattvaṃ ca tāraṃ tāmraṃ sucūrṇitam || 121 ||
ityevaṃ saptavārāṃstu drutaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ samam |
jāyate kanakaṃ divyaṃ samāvarte na saṃśayaḥ |
pūrvoktaṃ bhasmasūtaṃ vā guñjāmātraṃ sadā lihet |
samena jāyate baddho dhārayettaṃ mukhe sadā || 132 ||
triguṇaṃ tu bhavedyāvattato ratnāni vai kramāt |
mardyaṃ ruddhvā dhamedgāḍhaṃ jāyate guṭikā śubhā || 149 ||
yasya vaktre sthitā hyeṣā sa bhavedbhairavopamaḥ || 150 ||
sarvaṃ palatrayaṃ khādennityaṃ syāt krāmaṇe hitam || 153 ||
sūtatulyaṃ mṛtaṃ vajraṃ tasmin kṣiptvā'tha mardayet |
kṣipejjambīragarbhe taṃ vastre baddhvā tryahaṃ pacet || 167 ||
tīkṣṇaṃ sauvīracūrṇaṃ ca tulyaṃ ruddhvā dhameddṛḍham || 170 ||
dinaikaṃ taptakhalve tu taṃ ruddhvā bhūdhare pacet |
yasya vaktre sthitā hyeṣā tasya kālaḥ karoti kim || 175 ||
jāyante nātra sandehaḥ śivāmbu krāmakaṃ pibet |
tatkhoṭaṃ cūrṇitaṃ kṛtvā cābhiṣiktaṃ tu pūrvavat || 178 ||
snigdhabhāṇḍe tu tāṃ ruddhvā dhānyarāśau niveśayet |
lakṣavedhakarī yā tu sā datte viṣṇuvadbalam || 186 ||
dhūmravedhī tu yā siddhā sā śaktipadadāyinī || 189 ||
śabdavedhakarā yā tu sā yasya vatsarāvadhi || 190 ||
vaktre sthitā sa vai siddho nityaṃ nityapadaṃ labhet |
raktakṛṣṇamukhe devi rasasiddhiṃ dadasva me || 194 || svāhā
kālikāṃ bhairavaṃ siddhān kumārīṃ sādhitaṃ rasam || 195 ||
tadarthaṃ pañca tattvāni ṣaṣṭhaṃ jīvaṃ ca sādhayet |
kākinyāḥ puṣpakāle tu saṅgaṃ kṛtvā samāharet || 198 ||
caturmukhasya koṣṭhasya pṛṣṭhe dhāryaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yathā || 203 ||
dhamanaṃ tatra kurvīta caturdikṣu śanaiḥ śanaiḥ |

note.p: asyāgre aiṃ hrīṃ śrīṃ śrīṃ ityadhikaṃ kha. pustake |

lg.l: sutaptaṃ phenanirmuktaṃ nirdhūmaṃ ca yadā bhavet |
namaskṛtya guruṃ devaṃ dehaṃ tatra vinikṣipet |
aptattvākhyaṃ rasaṃ tasmin kṣipedraktaṃ bhavettu tat || 209 ||
jīvate vajradehaḥ san satyaṃ satyaṃ śivoditam || 214 ||
āyāti nātra sandeha stasya siddhasya sammukham |
bhuñjānaḥ sarvabhogāṃśca yogināṃ sa priyo bhavet |

div.trailer: iti pārvatīputraśrīnityanāthasiddhaviracite rasaratnākare rasāyanakhaṇḍe guṭikārasāyanaṃ nāma tṛtīyopadeśaḥ |

div.head: atha caturthopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: lohapātre khare gharme tatpalārdhaṃ sadā pibet || 5 ||

div.head: rasāyanā abhrakayogāḥ |

lg.l: triṃśatpale gavāṃ kṣīre tat paceccātha śītalam || 12 ||
keśā dantā nakhāstasya patanti hyudbhavanti ca |
mṛtābhraṃ gandhakaṃ śuddhaṃ kaṇā sava samaṃ ghṛtaiḥ || 15 ||
mṛtābhrakasya karṣaikaṃ gavāṃ kṣīraṃ palaṃ tathā |
samūlapatrāṃ sarpākṣīṃ sārdrāṃ piṣṭvā ca gandhakam || 18 ||
mṛtābhraṃ kāntalohaṃ ca triphalā māgadhī samam |

div.p: amṛtakrīḍe viṣṇusaṃvaraṇi svāhā || anena mantreṇa sarve abhraka- yogā abhimantrya bhakṣaṇīyāḥ |

div.head: rasāyanāḥ kāntayogāḥ |

lg.l: varṣaikena jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ hanti satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
śoṣayityā vicūrṇyātha tāni kāntaṃ mṛtaṃ samam || 29 ||
mṛtaṃ kāntaṃ śilā śuddhā tulyaṃ madhvājyakairlihet |
triniṣkaṃ mṛtatīkṣṇaṃ tu muṇḍaṃ vā kāntameva vā |
divārātraṃ sthitaṃ peyaṃ tannityaṃ tu śivāmbunā |

div.p: oṃṃ haḥ amṛte amṛtaśakti amṛtagandhopajīvi niṣpannaṃ candrāmṛtaṃ ājñāpitaṃ kuru kuru svāhā he he haṃ haḥ gam iti gandhakalohayorbhakṣa- ṇamantraḥ ||

lg.l: baddhe koṣṭhe tu dīptāgnau taptaṃ kṣīraṃ pibetsadā || 41 ||
śṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ tato'nnaṃ ca sevyaṃ lauharasāyane || 43 ||
adho rakṣyaṃ trihastaṃ syāttasya mūrdhni bilaṃ kṛtam |

div.head: śvetapālāśakalpaḥ |

note.p: chidraṃ paśyati māsādvai nidhānāni ca bhūtale kha. |

lg.l: anye yogā yathā rakte brahmavṛkṣe ca ye guṇāḥ |

div.p: amṛtaṃ kuru kuru amṛtamālinyai namaḥ || anena mantreṇa sarvayogā saptābhimantritā bhakṣaṇīyāḥ |

div.head: muṇḍīkalpaḥ |

lg.l: śuklapakṣe'tha pūrṇāyāṃ puṣye vā śravaṇe tathā |
chāyāśuṣkaṃ tu taccūrṇaṃ karṣaṃ gopayasā saha |

div.p: oṃṃ namo'mṛtodbhavāya amṛtaṃ kuru kuru svāhā o hrāṃ saḥ || iti auṣadhabhakṣaṇamantraḥ |

div.head: devadālīkalpaḥ |

lg.l: taccūrṇaṃ karṣamātraṃ tu nityaṃ peyaṃ śivāmbunā || 68 ||
cūrṇitaṃ karṣamātraṃ tu nityaṃ peyaṃ śivāmbunā |
varṣānmṛtyuṃ jarāṃ hanti chidrāṃ paśyati medinīm || 70 ||

div.p: oṃṃ amṛtagaṇa rudragaṇāmbhaḥ svāhā | ayaṃ ca grahaṇamantraḥ || namo bhagavate rudrāya huṃ phaṭ svāhā | ayaṃ sādhakasya śikhābandhana- mantraḥ || oṃṃ cara ra ra | ayaṃ bhakṣaṇamantraḥ ||

div.head: śvetārkakalpaḥ |
div.p: oṃṃ āṃ haṃ vāsaramāline svāhā | ayaṃ bhakṣaṇamantraḥ ||

div.head: hastikarṇakalpaḥ |

lg.l: chāyāśuṣkaṃ tu taccūrṇaṃ gavāṃ kṣīraiḥ pibetpalam || 76 ||

div.p: oṃṃ garaviṣaṃ dṛṣṭau gṛhṇāmi svāhā | hastikarṇagrahaṇamantraḥ || oṃṃ amṛtakuṭījātānāṃ amṛtaṃ kuru kuru svāhā | anena pūjayet | oṃṃ amṛtodbhavāya amṛtaṃ kuru kuru nityaṃ namo namaḥ | bhakṣaṇamantraḥ ||

div.head: nirguṇḍīkalpaḥ |

lg.l: taccūrṇaṃ triphalā muṇḍī bhṛṅgī nimbo guḍūcikā || 88 ||
vacā caiṣāṃ samaṃ cūrṇaṃ madhvājyābhyāṃ lihetpalam |

div.p: oṃṃ namo māya gaṇapataye bhūpataye kuberāya svāhā iti bhakṣaṇamantraḥ ||

lg.l: guḍūcī muśalī muṇḍī nirguṇḍī ca śatāvarī |

div.head: śunakaśālmalikākalpaḥ |

lg.l: tasya puṣpāṇi saṅgṛhya gavāṃ kṣīraiḥ sadā pacet |
phalaikaṃ tasya vṛkṣasya gavāṃ kṣīreṇa pācayet |

div.p: oṃṃ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ saḥ saḥ saḥ amṛte amṛtavarṣiṇi amṛtasañjīvati sarvakāmaprade bhagavān somarāja ājñāpayati svāhā iti bhakṣa- ṇamantraḥ ||

div.head: triphalādiyogaḥ |

lg.l: sarvaṃ tulyaṃ kṛtaṃ cūrṇaṃ madhvājyābhyāṃ lihetpalam |

div.p: oṃṃ hrāṃ hrīṃ hrūṃ saḥ svāhā anena mantreṇa bhakṣayet ||

lg.l: rgrāhyaṃ divyauṣadhīnāṃ phaladalakusumaṃ mūlapatraṃ rasaṃ vā |

div.trailer: iti śrīpārvatīputraśrīnityanāthasiddhaviracite śrīrasaratnākare rasāyanakhaṇḍe nānārasāyanaṃ nāma caturthopadeśaḥ |

div.head: atha pañcamopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: utpalāni samūlāni pāradaṃ ca samaṃ samam || 6 ||
kuṣṭhacūrṇaṃ samadhvājyaṃ nityaṃ karṣaṃ lihettu yaḥ |
śiraḥ saṃveṣṭya vastreṇa prātaḥ snānaṃ samācaret || 16 ||
tulyaṃ ca nīlikādrāvaṃ sarvaṃ yāmaṃ vimardayet |
sindūrasya samaṃ cūrṇaṃ sābuṇaṃ ca tayoḥ samam |
cūrṇaṃ sarjī yavakṣāraṃ siddhārthaṃ kāñjikaiḥ saha || 28 ||
dinaikaṃ ca tato lepyaṃ keśānāṃ rañjanaṃ bhavet || 31 ||
niśā nīlī mṛṇālāni nāgaṃ lohaṃ ca cūrṇitam || 33 ||
tailaṃ prāhyaṃ tu tallepātkeśānāṃ rañjanaṃ bhavet || 43 ||
taddrutaṃ jāyate kṛṣṇaṃ karṣaikaṃ śirasi kṣipet |
madanasya ca bījāni puṣpaṃ koraṇṭakasya ca |
kṛṣṇavarṇaṃ tadā siddhaṃ pātre kṛṣṇāyase kṣipet || 55 ||
śuṣkaṃ cūrṇaṃ palaikaṃ tatsarveṣāṃ kāñjikaṃ samam |
trisaptāhaṃ prayatnena dravo deyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ || 60 ||
śiro rātrau divā snānaṃ yuktireṣā praśasyate |
sindūraṃ sphaṭikāṃ śvetāṃ jalena saha lepayet || 65 ||
tallepena tu romāṇi suśuklāni bhavanti hi |
manaḥśilā ca tulyāṃśaṃ cūrṇaṃ snukpayasā tryaham |
snāne kṛte śuṣkakaceṣu rātrau lepe kṛte pūrvadalaistu veṣṭyam |
dadhnā tilaiḥ snānamataḥ prabhāte kuryāttryahaṃ lepana mitthameva || 71 ||

div.trailer: iti pārvatīputraśrīnityanāthasiddhaviracite rasaratnākare rasāyanakhaṇḍe udvartanakeśarañjanādhikāro nāma pañcamopadeśaḥ |

div.head: atha ṣaṣṭhopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: yāmaṃ mardyaṃ punargandhaṃ sārdhaṃ tatra vinikṣipet || 7 ||
śaṇamūlaṃ sabījaṃ ca muśalī śarkarā samam || 10 ||
gavāṃ kṣīraiḥ palārdhaṃ tu anu rātro sadā pibet |
sadyo hatājamāṃsasya piṇḍe nyastaṃ ca sīvayet |
mṛtābhraṃ pāradaṃ svarṇaṃ tulyaṃ mardyaṃ dinatrayam || 16 ||
mṛtasūtaṃ trayo bhāgā bhāgaikaṃ hāṭakaṃ mṛtam |
tanmadhye śarkarāṃ drākṣāṃ dhātrīṃ rambhāphalaṃ madhu || 23 ||
tatsarvaṃ dinamekaṃ tu kāmadevo raso bhavet |
niṣkamātraṃ sadā bhakṣyaṃ gavāṃ kṣīraṃ pibedanu || 25 ||
mṛtaṃ tāmraṃ ca tāraṃ ca gandhakaṃ ca samaṃ dinam |
tenaiva vaṭakāḥ kāryā nityaṃ khādeddvayaṃ dvayam || 29 ||
paladvayaṃ dvayaṃ śuddhaṃ pāradaṃ gandhakaṃ śubham || 33 ||
mardyaṃ ruddhvā dinaṃ pacyādbhūdhare taṃ samuddharet |
evaṃ saptadinaṃ pacyātkande kande dinaṃ dinam || 44 ||
dolāyantre tryahaṃ yāvaddeyaṃ raktaṃ punaḥ punaḥ |
śatāvarī ca rambhāyāḥ phalaṃ sarvaṃ samaṃ bhavet || 50 ||
sarvatulyā sitā yojyā madhunā loḍitaṃ lihet |
padmabījaṃ kaseruṃ ca kandaṃ nālaṃ ca karṇikām || 52 ||
muśalī bhṛṅgarāṭ drākṣā pakvaṃ śleṣmātakaṃ phalam |
vijayā markaṭī māṣāḥ śaṇabījāni vai tilāḥ || 53 ||
cūrṇatulyaṃ mṛtaṃ cābhraṃ sarvatulyā tu śarkarā |
tailena pakvaṃ caṭakaṃ khādetpūrvaṃ tu bhojanāt |
etaccūrṇaṃ mṛtābhraṃ tu tulyaṃ śarkarayā samam || 70 ||
ekaviṃśativārān vai śoṣyaṃ peṣyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ || 72 ||
gokṣuraṃ muśalīkandaṃ mṛtaṃ sūtaṃ samaṃ samam |
ūrṇanābhiṃ samaṃ kṣaudraiḥ piṣṭvā nābhiṃ pralepayet |
ghṛtāktā dalitā māṣā kṣīreṇa saha pācitāḥ || 82 ||
kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bhajedrāmāṃ yathā pārāvato dhruvam || 83 ||
śālmalyaṅghri phalatrikaṃ kapibhavaṃ bījaṃ samaṃ cūrṇaye-
ccūrṇāśā vijayā sitā dviguṇitā madhvājyamiśraṃ tu tat || 85 ||
karṣārdhāṃ gulikāṃ vilehyamathavā kṛtvā sadā sevaye-

div.trailer: iti pārvatīputraśrīnityanāthasiddhaviracite śrīrasaratnākare rasāyanakhaṇḍe vīryavardhanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭha upadeśaḥ ||

div.head: atha saptamopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: vīryaṃ sthiraṃ yonimukheṣu yeṣāṃ sthūlaṃ dṛḍhaṃ dīrghatamaṃ ca liṅgam |
teṣāṃ pragalbhāḥ pramadāśca sarvā bhavanti tṛptāḥ surataprasaṅge || 1 ||
piṇḍaṃ garbhe nirundhyātha mukhaṃ sūtreṇa sīvayet |
mukhāddhastaṃ yadā prāptā tadā vīryaṃ patatyalam |
rocanā sahadevī ca samaṃ sarvaṃ prapeṣayet || 10 ||
naro nārīsahasraikaṃ gacchan vīryaṃ na muñcati || 11 ||
tryūṣaṇaiśca gavāṃ kṣīraiḥ piṣṭvā kuryādvaṭīṃ dṛḍhām || 13 ||
bhaume prāptaḥ samuddhṛtya bandhetkaṭyāṃ ca vīryadhṛk || 15 ||
na muñcati naro vīryaṃ śayyāṃ pādena na spṛśet || 16 ||
tasyāsthi dhārayetkaṭyāṃ naro vīryaṃ na muñcati || 17 ||
piṣṭvā madhvājyasaṃyukto lepo nābhau tu vīryadhṛk |
jalaiḥ piṣṭvā vaṭī dhāryā vīryastambhakarī mukhe || 20 ||
tannābhau vīryadhṛk puṃsāṃ mūlaṃ vā tulasībhavam || 21 ||
jihvopari sthite tasminnaro vīryaṃ na muñcati |
ajākṣīreṇa taṃ piṣṭvā karṣaṃ bhuktvā tu vīryadhṛk |
na muñcati naro vīryaṃ karṣaikena pṛthakpṛthak |
sarvaṃ baddhvā kaṭau vīryaṃ cirakālaṃ na muñcati || 27 ||
pādau vīryadharo bhūyātpabhdyāṃ śayyāṃ na saṃspṛśet || 28 ||
navanītena vā lepyaṃ caṭakāṇḍaṃ ca pūrvavat |
bhāvayettena lepena naro vīryaṃ na muñcati |
vīryaṃ stambhayate puṃsāṃ yāmamātraṃ na saṃśayaḥ |
sūtaṃ svarṇaṃ vyomasattvaṃ tāraṃ tāmraṃ ca rocanam || 34 ||
vāmahaste kaniṣṭhāyāṃ naro vīryaṃ na muñcati || 37 ||

div.head: vīryastambhārthaṃ sthalamīnayogaḥ |
div.p: paścimasamudrasya taṭe amaracaṇḍeśvaro nāma devatāyatanaṃ, tasyāpre vālukāmadhye sthalamīnāstiṣṭhanti, te ca vālukāmīnāḥ kathyante ||

lg.l: śuddhasūte vinikṣipya svarṇaṃ vā nāgameva vā |
māgadhīṃ ca jalaiḥ piṣṭvā tatsarvaṃ taptakhalvake || 42 ||
sā yojyā kāmakāle tu nārīṇāṃ yonigahvare || 43 ||
bālye ṣaḍaṅgulā yojyā yauvane sā navāṅgulā || 44 ||
yo vā tāṃ dhārayenmūrdhni vīryaṃ tasya sthiraṃ bhavet || 45 ||
yojyaṃ ca triphalā bhṛṅgī śuṇṭhī chāgapayo ghṛtam || 50 ||

div.head: liṅgavardhanāḥ katipayayogāḥ |

lg.l: apāmārgo yavā māṣāḥ pippalī ca samaṃ jalaiḥ |
atidīrghaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sthūlaṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
aśvagandhā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ bṛhatī ca śatāvarī || 59 ||
pippalī maricaṃ kṣīraṃ sitā tulyaṃ vimardayet || 63 ||
māhiṣaṃ goghṛtaṃ tulyaṃ saindhavaṃ ca samaṃ samam || 64 ||

div.p: oṃṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya sara prasara 2 kuru kuru ṭha ṭhaḥ | anena mantreṇa sarve vardhanayogāḥ saptābhimantritāḥ siddhā bhavanti ||

lg.l: māsaikādvardhate liṅgaṃ stanau karṇau ca mardanāt || 70 ||

p.q: oṃṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya sara prasara prasara nikala nikala nikālaya nikālaya svāhā ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ ||

lg.l: gṛhagodhā śuno jihvā strījarāyuḥ samaṃ samam |
piṣṭvā dhāryaṃ tāmrapātre saptāhāttaṃ punaḥ pacet || 71 ||
liṅgaṃ stanau ca karṇau ca hastau pādau na saṃśayaḥ || 72 ||

p.q: oṃṃ namo bhagavate uḍḍāmareśvarāya sara sara hili hili svāhā ṭhaḥ ṭhaḥ ||

div.trailer: iti pārvatīputraśrīnityanāthasiddhaviracite rasaratnākare rasāyanakhaṇḍe vīryastambhanaliṅgavardhanaṃ nāma saptamopadeśaḥ ||

div.head: athāṣṭamopadeśaḥ |

lg.l: stacchāstraṃ śambhunoktaṃ pragahanamakhilaṃ vīkṣitaṃ yattu sāram |
śilā tiṣṭhati yā rātrau sravate gugguluṃ sadā || 2 ||
taddvāre vidyate kuṇḍaṃ tatra ghaṇṭā vilambate |
spraṣṭuṃ candro yadā gacchettadā kṣipraṃ karāñjalim || 12 ||
vidyate tasya mūle tu bhairavo dṛśyate svayam |
tasmin kuṇḍe vinikṣipya tāni mīnā bhavanti vai |
kaṇṭakāni śiraḥ pucchaṃ śeṣaṃ bhakṣeta sādhakaḥ |
kṣaṇaṃ mūrcchā bhavettena prabuddho jāyate svayam || 18 ||
tatkṣīraṃ jāyate raktaṃ tatkṣīraṃ sādhakaḥ pibet |
teṣāṃ pṛṣṭhe tilāḥ kṣiptāḥ sphuṭantyeva hi tatkṣaṇāt |
ityevaṃ pratyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃśca ghṛṣṭvā parasparam || 26 ||
kṣīramadhye kṣipettān vai kṣīraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ prajāyate |
devaḥ svargapurī nāma vidyate tatra vai khanet || 29 ||
devāgre bhūmikāṃ jānumātrāṃ tatra phalā iva |
nirgacchanti tu pāṣāṇāḥ kharasparśā bhavanti vai || 30 ||
vidyate hi biladvāraṃ tanmadhye dhanuṣāṃ trayam || 31 ||
tatphalānāṃ rasaṃ pītvā mūrcchā sañjāyate kṣaṇam || 32 ||
ādāya tān dhamettīvraṃ divyaṃ bhavati kāñcanam || 37 ||
guñjā ca riṭhṭhakaścaiva dvau vṛkṣau tatra tiṣṭhataḥ |
tathā hastiśilā tatra tasyā dakṣiṇataḥ khanet |
nāmnā hastiśiraḥ khyātaṃ saiva hastiśilā bhavet || 42 ||
yo'sau gacchati tasyādho nāsau kenāpi dṛśyate || 44 ||
vastre baddhvā tu tadvastraṃ vaṃśāgre bandhayeddṛḍham |
tadvaṃśāgraṃ kṣaṇaikena jāyate guṭikā tu tām |
vastre gorocanaṃ baddhvā vaṃśasthaṃ tatra veśayet |
srotoñjanaṃ kajjalaṃ ca kṣiptvā tatraiva pūrvavat |
tena cāñjitanetro yo devairapi na dṛśyate || 52 ||
pādukāṃ tena yogena kṣiptvā padbhyāṃ tu dhārayet |
yatrecchā tatra tatraiva gantā bhavati tatkṣaṇāt || 53 ||
adṛśyo jāyate samyakpaṭe mukte tu dṛśyate || 54 ||
kāntābhraṃ kāñcanaṃ sūtaṃ kṛtvā golaṃ tu veśayet |
navamaṃ yattu sopānaṃ nadyāṃ tattādṛśaṃ sthitam |
tasmin vane sthitaṃ kuṇḍaṃ tatra tiṣṭhati caṇḍikā || 58 ||
baddhvā vastre kṣipetkuṇḍe snānaṃ tatra samācaret || 59 ||
snānānte poṭalī grāhyā sarve matsyā bhavanti te |
tṛtīyaṃ sādhako bhuktvā kṣaṇaṃ bhavati mūrcchitaḥ || 61 ||
tasya grāmasya pārśve tu hastamātraṃ khanedbhuvam || 63 ||
pāṣāṇāḥ sarpavadvakrā grāhyā sparśā bhavanti te |
devyā hyagre guhā ramyā tanmadhye nikhanedbhuvam |
tatphalaṃ chidritaṃ kṛtvā utpāṭya bhramaraṃ tataḥ || 72 ||
tāraṃ tāmraṃ bhujaṅgaṃ vā koṭibhāgena vedhayet |
oṃṃ hrīṃ vidyāvāgīśvarādhipataye hrīṃ oṃṃ svāhā |
varaṃ datte yatheṣṭaṃ vai sādhakasya na saṃśayaḥ || 86 ||
śatamāyatanaṃ tatra kūpānāṃ ca śataṃ nava |
tatraiva maukalī nāma yakṣiṇī prakaṭā sthitā |
sā vakti bhojanaṃ dehi yadīcchasi samīhitam || 89 ||
sā vakti mama putro'yaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vakṣasi dhāraya |
yadā na muñcase bhūmau tadā siddhyaṣṭakaṃ tava || 91 ||
tatra dhātrīphalaiḥ pūrṇaṃ śyāmalaṃ nandanaṃ vanam |
tatra bilvaphalaiḥ pūrṇaṃ dṛśyate nandanaṃ vanam || 99 ||
hāraṃ dāsyati sā tuṣṭā na praveśaṃ prayacchati |
ha hā he he haṃ hruṃkāraṃ phaṭ huṃ svāhāntameva ca || 106 ||
dadāti khecarīṃ siddhiṃ na praveśaṃ kadācana || 107 ||
dṛśyate divyacāpaṃ tu tathā liṅgaṃ manoharam |
pratyakṣo jāyate rudro varaṃ datte yathepsitam || 110 ||
ahaṃ patnī bhaviṣyāmi yāvadbrahmā ca jīvati || 115 ||
tadante paramaṃ sthānaṃ gacchāmo nātra saṃśayaḥ |
matsyā bhavanti te sarve tāmrapātre vinikṣipet || 118 ||
nadīsthāne ca yo vṛkṣo vidyate kuṇḍaleśvare |
tasya kuryāt prayatnena trivāraṃ tu pradakṣiṇam || 121 ||
gate tu dṛśyate kuṇḍaṃ raso lākṣārasaprabhaḥ |
mudgavarṇā ca sā khyātā sparśavedhakarā tu sā || 136 ||
tasya pṛṣṭhāttṛṇaṃ grāhyaṃ tatsarvaṃ kanakaṃ bhavet || 137 ||
śrīśailasya tu vāyavye tīrthaṃ devahradaḥ sthitam |
tatra liṅgaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ jalaṃ caiva tu tādṛśam || 142 ||
śrīśailasya tu nairṛtye nāmnā guṇḍiprabhā sthitā |
tathā tambīpure nāmni tīrthe ca vipule śubham |
tasyādhaḥ kaṭimātraṃ tu khātvā nīlāṃ mṛdaṃ haret |
tasya pṛṣṭhe ca gomāṃsaṃ mahāmāṃsaṃ ca vā kṣipet || 155 ||
prajvālya badarīkāṣṭhaiḥ prātaḥ svarṇopamā tu sā |
tasya devasya pārśve tu pāṣāṇāḥ śvetapītakāḥ || 164 ||
tasya devasya pūrve tu kūpaḥ syānnātidūrataḥ || 165 ||
taṃ sarvaṃ nikṣipenmadhye sarvaṃ tatkāñcanaṃ bhavet |
gate ḍāṅgarikaṃ tatra dṛśyate tasya mūrdhani || 174 ||
tanmadhye śuṣkavaṃśaṃ tu kṣiptvā syānnūtanaḥ kṣaṇāt || 179 ||
dine patraṃ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ jāyate tasya nānyathā |

div.p: kṣetradevatāmāvāhayet | tatra svapne devatā pratyakṣībhūya varaṃ dadāti |

evaṃ mantraparaiḥ suniścalatarairbhaktaiśca tatsādhakaiḥ
śambhoḥ pūjanatatparaiḥ pratidinaṃ pūjāvidheḥ pālakaiḥ |
kāryaṃ śrīgirisādhanaṃ japaparairāmnāyapāraṅgatai
rno cetkleśakaraṃ parākṛtamaho vyarthaṃ bhavenniścitam || 185 ||
